Version 1.1.0 (6)

⚠️ Update Error: The automatic update could not be validated due to a code signing issue.
Please click here to manually download the latest version (.dmg).
  • Improved Settings Organization: The settings menu has been reorganized for a cleaner and more intuitive experience.
  • Menubar Date Display Options: You can now choose to display just the Month & Day or only the Day in the menubar, instead of the full date format.
  • Bug Fixes & UI Enhancements:
    • Fixed issues related to color display and date formatting.
    • Simplified the settings layout.
  • New Update Checker: The app can now automatically check for future updates.
  • General Maintenance: Updated dependencies and made various performance improvements.

Thank you for using Nepali Calendar Mac!

Feedback is always welcome!
